spec.name: ForceofNature
spec.attrs: Your team gains +1 maximum team size.

spec.name: AdaptiveImplant
spec.attrs:
Mod: While above 50% health, gain 30% attack damage and 30 ability power. While below, gain 30% omnivamp.

Overcharge: Always gain both effects, and their power is increased by 60%

spec.name: VirulentBioware
spec.attrs:
Mod: Release a virulent plague whenever you deal Ability damage, causing enemies within 1 hex of the target to take 20% more damage for 4 seconds.

Overcharge: Plague duration is 10 seconds and plague deals 5% max health magic damage per second.

spec.name: HextechExoskeleton
spec.attrs:
Mod: Gain 30 armor and magic resistance. Every 5 seconds, cleanse all negative effects and heal for 12% of your max health.

Overcharge: Each time the wearer heals, deal 150% of the heal amount as damage to all nearby enemies.

spec.name: ShimmerInjector
spec.attrs:
Mod: Gain 25% attack speed. The first time you would be reduced to 1 heath, increase the attack speed by 100% and heal for 35% of your max health.

Overcharge: Instead increase the attack speed 400% and heal 100% of your max health.

spec.name: RoboticArm
spec.attrs:
Mod: Attacks have a 40% chance to trigger 1 additional attacks.

Overcharge: Attack deal 50% Attack Damage as bonus true damage.

spec.name: UnstableChemtank
spec.attrs:
Mod: Gain 33% bonus max health and explode on death, dealing 35% of your maximum health as magic damage to nearby enemies.

Overcharge: Explosion gets larger and damage increases to 45% of your maximum health.

spec.name: NeedlesslyBigGem
spec.attrs: Once per combat: If the holder is alive after 15 seconds of combat, grant 1 gold per 2 living allies, and each living ally deals 1% more damage per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold).

spec.name: DravensAxe
spec.attrs: Gain 1% Attack Damage per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold).Attacks grant 1 stack, up to 100 times. At full stacks, grant 9 gold.

spec.name: GamblersBlade
spec.attrs: Grant 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold).Each attack has a 6% chance to drop 1 gold.

spec.name: DiamondHands
spec.attrs: Once per combat: At 50% Health, become invulnerable for 1.5 seconds and grant 2 gold.

spec.name: CrownofDemacia
spec.attrs: If the wearer starts combat in the front 2 rows, regenerate 2-7% maximum Health per second (based on stage). If they start in the back 2 rows, gain 1-7% AD and AP every second instead. If the wearer of this item dies, you instantly lose the fight.You can remove this item by benching the wearer.

spec.name: TheDarkinBlade
spec.attrs: If the holder of this item gets a takedown, they will be consumed and Aatrox will be reborn!

spec.name: MogulsMail
spec.attrs: Grants 1 Armor, 1 Magic Resist, and 6 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 40 times. At full stacks, grant 2 gold.

spec.name: GoldmancersStaff
spec.attrs: Grant 1 Ability Power per gold in your bank (up to 60 gold) and a 40% chance to drop 2 gold on enemy kill.

spec.name: DeterminedInvestor
spec.attrs: After dying during combat 8 times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction, grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator, and 5 gold.

spec.name: Scrollofknowledge
spec.attrs: Use on a unit to open a special armory that offers every available emblem that matches that unit's inherent traits.

spec.name: Masterworkupgrade
spec.attrs: Use on a unit to open an armory containing Radiant versions of that unit's craftable completed items. Upgrade the item you choose to its Radiant equivalent, and unequip it.
